meanings.definition: To consume an excessive amount of alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: He overdrinks at every party he attends.
meanings.sent2: She always regrets it when she overdrinks.
meanings.sent3: The bear overdrinks from the river and falls asleep.
meanings.sent4: The car overdrinks gasoline and breaks down on the highway.
meanings.sent5: Overdrinking can lead to health problems and accidents.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking too much alcohol.
meanings.sent1: His overdrinks caused him to feel sick the next day.
meanings.sent2: Overdrinks can be harmful to your health.
meanings.sent3: The overdrinks at the party were evident by the empty bottles.
meanings.sent4: Her fridge is full of overdrinks for the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The overdrinks at the bar led to a lively atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: She overdrinks when she is stressed.
meanings.sent2: He overdrinks to cope with his problems.
meanings.sent3: The cat overdrinks milk and gets a tummy ache.
meanings.sent4: The engine overdrinks oil and starts smoking.
meanings.sent5: Overdrinking is not a solution to your troubles.
